amendatorysection.para: The Livestock Auction Market Act shall not be construed to include:
(1) Any place or operation where Future Farmers of America, 4-H groups, or private fairs conduct sales of livestock;
(2) Any place or operation conducted for a dispersal sale of the livestock of farmers, dairypersons, or livestock breeders or feeders, where no other livestock is sold or offered for sale; or

(3) Any place or operation where a breeder or an association of breeders of livestock assemble and offer for sale and sell under their own management any livestock, when such breeders assume all responsibility of such sale and the title of livestock sold. This shall apply to all purebred livestock association sales.
